message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to me, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $130. This is an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable item at a discounted rate. I trust you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
